TopicTitle: Wings randomly exploing in a puff of smoke

Articles.Content:
Hi Guys

Quick question: I've noticed that on some craft when I switch to them their wings start exploding in puffs of smoke. Does this happen to anyone else?

Next time it happens check the [F3] flight log to see what exploded and why. Even though you're well up in space you might be crashing into one of the KSC buildings. It's a well known bug though I do not know what's causing it or how to solve.

Don't tell me THAT bug still exists?! I almost always encountered it just as I was coming up to the runway with an SSTO from orbit, with the space centre somehow annihilating the ends of my main wings along with my tail fins. I managed to land most of the time, but good god, it was infuriating.

If I encounter it in 1.0, I won't be happy. That was one bug I expected to be gone.
I **HAVE** encountered it in 1.0.X. So sadly yes, it does still exist.
